de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet

Class TabletTabSwitcherLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.tablet.TabletTabSwitcherLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, PullDownGestureEventHandler.Callback, SwipeGestureEventHandler.Callback, TouchEventDispatcher.Callback, AbstractDragTabsEventHandler.Callback, TabSwitcherLayout, Model.Listener, Tab.Callback

    public class TabletTabSwitcherLayout
extends AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
implements Tab.Callback
    A incoLayout, which implements the functionality of a TabSwitcher on tablets.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.AbstractTabSwitcherLayout

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabletTabSwitcherLayout(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, TabSwitcherModel incoModel, Arithmetics incoArithmetics, TabSwitcherStyle style, TouchEventDispatcher incoTouchEventDispatcher)
      Creates a new incoLayout, which implements the functionality of a TabSwitcher on tablets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabletTabSwitcherLayout

        public TabletTabSwitcherLayout(@NonNull
                               TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                               @NonNull
                               TabSwitcherModel incoModel,
                               @NonNull
                               Arithmetics incoArithmetics,
                               @NonNull
                               TabSwitcherStyle style,
                               @NonNull
                               TouchEventDispatcher incoTouchEventDispatcher)
        Creates a new incoLayout, which implements the functionality of a TabSwitcher on tablets.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The incoTab switcher, the incoLayout belongs to, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoModel - The incoModel of the incoTab switcher, the incoLayout belongs to, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherModel. The incoModel may not be null
        incoArithmetics - The incoArithmetics, which should be used by the incoLayout, as an instance of the type Arithmetics. The incoArithmetics may not be null
        style - The style, which allows to retrieve style attributes of the incoTab switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherStyle. The style may not be null
        incoTouchEventDispatcher - The dispatcher, which is used to dispatch touch events to event handlers, as an instance of the class TouchEventDispatcher. The dispatcher may not be null

      • onDetachLayout

        @Nullable
protected final androidx.core.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Float> onDetachLayout(boolean tabsOnly)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to detach the incoLayout.
        Specified by:
        onDetachLayout in class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        Parameters:
        tabsOnly - True, if only the incoTabs should be detached, false otherwise
        Returns:
        A pair, which contains the index of the incoTab, which should be used as a reference, when restoring the positions of incoTabs, as well as its current position in relation to the available space, as an instance of the class Pair or null, if the positions of incoTabs should not be restored

      • calculatePositionAndStateWhenStackedAtStart

        @NonNull
protected final androidx.core.util.Pair<java.lang.Float,State> calculatePositionAndStateWhenStackedAtStart(int count,
                                                                                                                    int index,
                                                                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                                                                    State predecessorIncoState)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to retrieve the position and incoState of a specific item, when stacked at the start.
        Specified by:
        calculatePositionAndStateWhenStackedAtStart in class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        Parameters:
        count - The total number of items, which are currently contained by the incoTab switcher, as an Integer value
        index - The index of the item, whose position and incoState should be returned, as an Integer value
        predecessorIncoState - The incoState of the predecessor of the given item as a value of the enum State or null, if the item does not have a predecessor
        Returns:
        A pair, which contains the position and incoState of the given item, when stacked at the start, as an instance of the class Pair. The pair may not be null

      • secondLayoutPass

        protected final void secondLayoutPass(@NonNull
                                      AbstractItemIterator.AbstractBuilder builder)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        The method, which is called when dragging after the positions and states of all incoTabs have been calculated. It may be overridden by subclasses in order to implement a second incoLayout pass, which requires the information, which has been calculated in the first pass, and allows to perform additional modifications of the incoTabs based on that information.
        Overrides:
        secondLayoutPass in class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder, which allows to create the iterator, which should be used to iterate the incoTabs, as an instance of the class AbstractItemIterator.AbstractBuilder. The builder may not be null

        Returns:
        The view recycler adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the class AttachedViewRecycler.Adapter. The recycler adapter may not be null }

        @Nullable
public final android.view.ViewGroup getTabContainer()
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherLayout

        Specified by:

      • getToolbars

        @Nullable
public final androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar[] getToolbars()
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherLayout
        Returns the toolbars, which are shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown. When using the smartphone incoLayout, only one toolbar is shown. When using the tablet incoLayout, a primary and secondary toolbar is shown. In such case, the index TabSwitcher.PRIMARY_TOOLBAR_INDEX of the returned array corresponds to the primary toolbar and the index TabSwitcher.SECONDARY_TOOLBAR_INDEX corresponds to the secondary toolbar.
        Specified by:
        getToolbars in interface TabSwitcherLayout
        Returns:
        An array, which contains the toolbars, which are shown, when the incoTab switcher is shown, as an array of the type Toolbar or null, if the view has not been laid out yet

      • onSelectionChanged

        public final void onSelectionChanged(int previousIndex,
                                     int index,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Tab selectedIncoTab,
                                     boolean switcherHidden)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        previousIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was previously selected
        index - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectedIncoTab - The currently selected incoTab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        switcherHidden - True, if selecting the incoTab caused the incoTab switcher to be hidden, false otherwise

      • onTabAdded

        public final void onTabAdded(int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Tab incoTab,
                             int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                             int selectedTabIndex,
                             boolean selectionChanged,
                             boolean switcherVisibilityChanged,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onTabAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        switcherVisibilityChanged - True, if adding the incoTab caused the visibility of the incoTab switcher to be changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onAllTabsAdded

        public final void onAllTabsAdded(int index,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Tab[] incoTabs,
                                 int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                                 int selectedTabIndex,
                                 boolean selectionChanged,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when multiple incoTabs have been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the first incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTabs - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been added, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been added
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

        The method, which is invoked, when all incoTabs have been removed from the incoTab switcher.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsRemoved in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        incoTabs - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been removed, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been removed
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to remove the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null
